name: Sammy the Snake
description:
Sammy the Snake is a platformer where you can't jump.

Instead, you must use the snake power of OROBOROS to roll and bounce over enemies. Collect coins, find a secret, and avoid death in this cute platformer.

Credits:

All art and code is by me.

All sound is from freesound.org.

Music: "Happy 8bit Loop 01" by Tristan Lohengrin : https://www.tristanlohengrin.fr/
